name: VRogger
description:
You stumble across a lone frog, alone, scared, and well out of his depth. The goodness in you implores you to return him to his natural habitat. Take up your newly acquainted friend on the back of your hand, and journey to his native habitat.

VRogger is a short single-player VR experience for the Meta Quest 2.  It has a focus on environmental storytelling that explores the impact we have had on the many facets of nature. While there aren't many deep gameplay elements to VRogger, we implore you to take in the sights and sounds, investigate each of the unique areas you pass through, and ultimately, find calm in the frog natural wetlands habitat.

VRogger has 6 connected levels that flow into one another;

  • Road
  • Construction
  • Dumping
  • Farm
  • River
  • Wetlands

As you journey through them, you'll find that each has a distinct identity, with different core ideas and underlying themes that inform their design, and environmental storytelling. 

We hope you enjoy.

By Simon Gillespie and Harry Kalogirou

Controls

On the title screen point at Play and press trigger.  

Right thumb stick teleports.  Left thumb stick snap turns.
